verses.verse: וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> died שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel וַיִּקָּבְצ֤וּ <S%H6908><s%> were gathered together כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> and all the Israelites וַיִּסְפְּדוּ־ <S%H5594><s%> and lamented ל֔וֹ וַיִּקְבְּרֻ֥הוּ <S%H6912><s%> him and buried בְּבֵית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> him in his house בָּרָמָ֑ה <S%H7414><s%> at Ramah וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David וַיֵּ֖רֶד <S%H3381><s%> and went down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> to the wilderness פָּארָֽן׃ <S%H6290><s%> of Paran ס

וְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And [there was] a man בְּמָע֜וֹן <S%H4584><s%> in Maon וּמַעֲשֵׂ֣הוּ <S%H4639><s%> whose possessions בַכַּרְמֶ֗ל <S%H3760><s%> [were] in Carmel וְהָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> and the man גָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> great מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> [was] very וְל֛וֹ צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep שְׁלֹֽשֶׁת־ <S%H7969><s%> and he had three אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וְאֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> and a thousand עִזִּ֑ים <S%H5795><s%> goats וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> came בִּגְזֹ֥ז <S%H1494><s%> and he was shearing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹאנ֖וֹ <S%H6629><s%> his sheep בַּכַּרְמֶֽל׃ <S%H3760><s%> in Carmel

וְשֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> Now the name הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> of the man נָבָ֔ל <S%H5037><s%> [was] Nabal וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> of his wife אֲבִגָ֑יִל <S%H26><s%> Abigail וְהָאִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> and [she was] a woman טֽוֹבַת־ <S%H2896><s%> of good שֶׂ֙כֶל֙ <S%H7922><s%> understanding וִ֣יפַת <S%H3303><s%> and of a beautiful תֹּ֔אַר <S%H8389><s%> countenance וְהָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> but the man קָשֶׁ֛ה <S%H7186><s%> [was] churlish וְרַ֥ע <S%H7451><s%> and evil מַעֲלָלִ֖ים <S%H4611><s%> in his doings וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he [כָלֶבֹו כ] (כָלִבִּֽי׃ <S%H3820><s%> care for ק)

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> heard דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> And David בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גֹזֵ֥ז <S%H1494><s%> did shear נָבָ֖ל <S%H5037><s%> that Nabal אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹאנֽוֹ׃ <S%H6629><s%> his sheep

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent out דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> And David עֲשָׂרָ֣ה <S%H6235><s%> ten נְעָרִ֑ים <S%H5288><s%> young men וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> and David לַנְּעָרִ֗ים <S%H5288><s%> unto the young men עֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> Get you up כַרְמֶ֙לָה֙ <S%H3760><s%> to Carmel וּבָאתֶ֣ם <S%H935><s%> and go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about נָבָ֔ל <S%H5037><s%> to Nabal וּשְׁאֶלְתֶּם־ <S%H7592><s%> ask counsel ל֥וֹ בִשְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> him in my name לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> favor

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H559><s%> And thus shall ye say כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> and thus לֶחָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> to him that liveth וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you שָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H7965><s%> [in prosperity] Peace וּבֵיתְךָ֣ <S%H1004><s%> [be] to thine house שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> [be] both to thee and peace וְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לְךָ֖ שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> and peace

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שָׁמַ֔עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> And now I have heard כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that גֹזְזִ֖ים <S%H1494><s%> that thou hast shearers לָ֑ךְ עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now הָרֹעִ֤ים <S%H7462><s%> now thy shepherds אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לְךָ֙ הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> have been עִמָּ֔נוּ <S%H5973><s%> them לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor הֶכְלַמְנ֗וּם <S%H3637><s%> which were with us we hurt וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor נִפְקַ֤ד <S%H6485><s%> missing לָהֶם֙ מְא֔וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> them not neither was there ought כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> unto them all the while הֱיוֹתָ֥ם <S%H1961><s%> have been בַּכַּרְמֶֽל׃ <S%H3760><s%> they were in Carmel

שְׁאַ֨ל <S%H7592><s%> Ask אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְעָרֶ֜יךָ <S%H5288><s%> thy young men וְיַגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> and they will shew לָ֗ךְ וְיִמְצְא֨וּ <S%H4672><s%> find הַנְּעָרִ֥ים <S%H5288><s%> thee Wherefore let the young men חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> favour בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thine eyes כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> in a good בָּ֑נוּ <S%H935><s%> for we come תְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> give נָּ֗א <S%H4994><s%> Please אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whatever תִּמְצָ֤א <S%H4672><s%> I pray thee whatsoever cometh יָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> to thine hand לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servants וּלְבִנְךָ֖ <S%H1121><s%> and to thy son לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> David

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> came נַעֲרֵ֣י <S%H5288><s%> young men דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And when David's וַיְדַבְּר֧וּ <S%H1696><s%> they spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָבָ֛ל <S%H5037><s%> to Nabal כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> according to all those words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַיָּנֽוּחוּ׃ <S%H5117><s%> and ceased

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered נָבָ֜ל <S%H5037><s%> And Nabal אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדֵ֤י <S%H5650><s%> servants דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David's וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David's וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> is the son יִשָׁ֑י <S%H3448><s%> Jesse הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> now a days רַבּ֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> abundance עֲבָדִ֔ים <S%H5650><s%> servants הַמִּתְפָּ֣רְצִ֔ים <S%H6555><s%> that break away אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from אֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <S%H113><s%> his master

וְלָקַחְתִּ֤י <S%H3947><s%> Shall I then take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לַחְמִי֙ <S%H3899><s%> my bread וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵימַ֔י <S%H4325><s%> and my water וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> טִבְחָתִ֔י <S%H2878><s%> and my flesh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whose טָבַ֖חְתִּי <S%H2873><s%> that I have killed לְגֹֽזְזָ֑י <S%H1494><s%> for my shearers וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> and give לַֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> to men אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> whose לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> whom I know אֵ֥י <S%H335><s%> how מִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> he הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

וַיַּהַפְכ֥וּ <S%H2015><s%> turned נַעֲרֵֽי־ <S%H5288><s%> young men דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> So David's לְדַרְכָּ֑ם <S%H1870><s%> their way וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> and went again וַיָּבֹ֔אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came וַיַּגִּ֣דוּ <S%H5046><s%> and told ל֔וֹ כְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> him all those sayings הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> And David לַאֲנָשָׁ֜יו <S%H376><s%> every man חִגְר֣וּ ׀ <S%H2296><s%> Gird ye on אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַרְבּ֗וֹ <S%H2719><s%> his sword וַֽיַּחְגְּרוּ֙ <S%H2296><s%> And they girded on אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַרְבּ֔וֹ <S%H2719><s%> his sword וַיַּחְגֹּ֥ר <S%H2296><s%> also girded on גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> and David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַרְבּ֑וֹ <S%H2719><s%> his sword וַֽיַּעֲל֣וּ ׀ <S%H5927><s%> and there went up אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after דָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> David כְּאַרְבַּ֤ע <S%H702><s%> about four מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man וּמָאתַ֖יִם <S%H3967><s%> and two hundred יָשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> abode עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with הַכֵּלִֽים׃ <S%H3627><s%> by the stuff

וְלַאֲבִיגַ֙יִל֙ <S%H26><s%> Abigail אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife נָבָ֔ל <S%H5037><s%> Nabal's הִגִּ֧יד <S%H5046><s%> told נַֽעַר־ <S%H5288><s%> of the young men אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> But one מֵהַנְּעָרִ֖ים <S%H5288><s%> men לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שָׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> sent דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> Behold David מַלְאָכִ֧ים ׀ <S%H4397><s%> messengers מֵֽהַמִּדְבָּ֛ר <S%H4057><s%> out of the wilderness לְבָרֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> to salute אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדֹנֵ֖ינוּ <S%H113><s%> our master וַיָּ֥עַט <S%H5860><s%> and he railed בָּהֶֽם׃

וְהָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> But the men טֹבִ֥ים <S%H2896><s%> good לָ֖נוּ מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> [were] very וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor הָכְלַ֙מְנוּ֙ <S%H3637><s%> unto us and we were not hurt וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor פָקַ֣דְנוּ <S%H6485><s%> neither missed מְא֔וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> we any thing כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> long יְמֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> as long as הִתְהַלַּ֣כְנוּ <S%H1980><s%> we were conversant אִתָּ֔ם <S%H854><s%> for בִּֽהְיוֹתֵ֖נוּ <S%H1961><s%> were in בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> with them when we were in the fields

חוֹמָה֙ <S%H2346><s%> They were a wall הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> unto גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both לַ֖יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> unto us both by night גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both יוֹמָ֑ם <S%H3119><s%> and day כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֛י <S%H3117><s%> all the while הֱיוֹתֵ֥נוּ <S%H1961><s%> become עִמָּ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> them רֹעִ֥ים <S%H7462><s%> we were with them keeping הַצֹּֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> the sheep

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now דְּעִ֤י <S%H3045><s%> Now therefore know וּרְאִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> and consider מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> what תַּעֲשִׂ֔י <S%H6213><s%> what thou wilt do כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כָלְתָ֧ה <S%H3615><s%> is determined הָרָעָ֛ה <S%H7451><s%> for evil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against אֲדֹנֵ֖ינוּ <S%H113><s%> against our master וְעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and against all his household וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> for he [is such] a son בְּלִיַּ֔עַל <S%H1100><s%> of Belial מִדַּבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> that [a man] cannot speak אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> against

וַתְּמַהֵ֣ר <S%H4116><s%> made haste [אֲבֹוגַיִל כ] (אֲבִיגַ֡יִל <S%H26><s%> Abigal ק) וַתִּקַּח֩ <S%H3947><s%> and took מָאתַ֨יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred לֶ֜חֶם <S%H3899><s%> loaves וּשְׁנַ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two נִבְלֵי־ <S%H5035><s%> bottles יַ֗יִן <S%H3196><s%> of wine וְחָמֵ֨שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five צֹ֤אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep [עֲשָׂוֹות כ] (עֲשׂוּיֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> accomplish ק) וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five סְאִים֙ <S%H5429><s%> measures קָלִ֔י <S%H7039><s%> of parched וּמֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> [corn] and an hundred צִמֻּקִ֖ים <S%H6778><s%> clusters of raisins וּמָאתַ֣יִם <S%H3967><s%> and two hundred דְּבֵלִ֑ים <S%H1690><s%> cakes וַתָּ֖שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> of figs and laid עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַחֲמֹרִֽים׃ <S%H2543><s%> [them] on asses

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said לִנְעָרֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5288><s%> unto her servants עִבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> Go on לְפָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> before הִנְנִ֖י <S%H2005><s%> behold אַחֲרֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H310><s%> after בָּאָ֑ה <S%H935><s%> me behold I come וּלְאִישָׁ֥הּ <S%H376><s%> not her husband נָבָ֖ל <S%H5037><s%> Nabal לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not הִגִּֽידָה׃ <S%H5046><s%> you But she told

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> came הִ֣יא ׀ <S%H1931><s%> she רֹכֶ֣בֶת <S%H7392><s%> And it was [so as] she rode עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַחֲמ֗וֹר <S%H2543><s%> on the ass וְיֹרֶ֙דֶת֙ <S%H3381><s%> that she came down בְּסֵ֣תֶר <S%H5643><s%> by the covert הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> of the hill וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> and behold David וַאֲנָשָׁ֔יו <S%H376><s%> and his men יֹרְדִ֖ים <S%H3381><s%> came down לִקְרָאתָ֑הּ <S%H7122><s%> toward וַתִּפְגֹּ֖שׁ <S%H6298><s%> her and she met אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> Now David אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> had said אַךְ֩ <S%H389><s%> Surely לַשֶּׁ֨קֶר <S%H8267><s%> Surely in vain שָׁמַ֜רְתִּי <S%H8104><s%> have I kept אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> that לָזֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> all that this בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> [fellow] hath in the wilderness וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נִפְקַ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> was missed מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֖וֹ מְא֑וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> so that nothing וַיָּֽשֶׁב־ <S%H7725><s%> of all that [pertained] unto him and he hath requited לִ֥י רָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> me evil תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash טוֹבָֽה׃ <S%H2896><s%> for good

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> So יַעֲשֶׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> also do אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> God לְאֹיְבֵ֥י <S%H341><s%> unto the enemies דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וְכֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> also יֹסִ֑יף <S%H3254><s%> and more אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אַשְׁאִ֧יר <S%H7604><s%> if I leave מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of any אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who ל֛וֹ עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> of all that [pertain] to him by הַבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> the morning מַשְׁתִּ֥ין <S%H8366><s%> any that pisseth בְּקִֽיר׃ <S%H7023><s%> against the wall

וַתֵּ֤רֶא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֲבִיגַ֙יִל֙ <S%H26><s%> And when Abigail אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַתְּמַהֵ֕ר <S%H4116><s%> she hasted וַתֵּ֖רֶד <S%H3381><s%> and lighted off מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from הַחֲמ֑וֹר <S%H2543><s%> the ass וַתִּפֹּ֞ל <S%H5307><s%> and fell לְאַפֵּ֤י <S%H639><s%> before דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פָּנֶ֔יהָ <S%H6440><s%> on her face וַתִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> herself to the ground

וַתִּפֹּל֙ <S%H5307><s%> And fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at רַגְלָ֔יו <S%H7272><s%> at his feet וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said בִּי־ אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> of thine handmaid אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> Upon me my lord הֶֽעָוֹ֑ן <S%H5771><s%> [upon] me [let this] iniquity וּֽתְדַבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> I pray thee speak נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> and please אֲמָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H519><s%> [be] and let thine handmaid בְּאָזְנֶ֔יךָ <S%H241><s%> in thine audience וּשְׁמַ֕ע <S%H8085><s%> and hear אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words אֲמָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H519><s%> of your maidservant

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please יָשִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> Let אֲדֹנִ֣י ׀ <S%H113><s%> not my lord אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לִבּ֡וֹ <S%H3820><s%> I pray thee regard אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> this man הַבְּלִיַּ֨עַל <S%H1100><s%> of Belial הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> to this עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and נָבָ֗ל <S%H5037><s%> [even] Nabal כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> as כִשְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> for as his name כֶּן־ <S%H3651><s%> is so ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> is he נָבָ֣ל <S%H5037><s%> [is] so [is] he Nabal שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name וּנְבָלָ֖ה <S%H5039><s%> and folly עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וַֽאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I אֲמָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H519><s%> [is] with him but I thine handmaid לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not רָאִ֛יתִי <S%H7200><s%> saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַעֲרֵ֥י <S%H5288><s%> not the young men אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> of my lord אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom שָׁלָֽחְתָּ׃ <S%H7971><s%> whom thou didst send

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אֲדֹנִ֗י <S%H113><s%> Now therefore my lord חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> [as] the LORD וְחֵֽי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth נַפְשְׁךָ֙ <S%H5315><s%> and [as] thy soul אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> since מְנָעֲךָ֤ <S%H4513><s%> hath withholden יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> seeing the LORD מִבּ֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> thee from coming בְדָמִ֔ים <S%H1818><s%> to [shed] blood וְהוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <S%H3467><s%> and from avenging יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> thyself with thine own hand לָ֑ךְ וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now יִֽהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> be as כְנָבָל֙ <S%H5037><s%> be as Nabal אֹיְבֶ֔יךָ <S%H341><s%> now let thine enemies וְהַֽמְבַקְשִׁ֥ים <S%H1245><s%> and they that seek אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> to my lord רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> evil

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now הַבְּרָכָ֣ה <S%H1293><s%> And now this blessing הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> hath brought שִׁפְחָתְךָ֖ <S%H8198><s%> which thine handmaid לַֽאדֹנִ֑י <S%H113><s%> unto my lord וְנִתְּנָה֙ <S%H5414><s%> let it even be given לַנְּעָרִ֔ים <S%H5288><s%> unto the young men הַמִּֽתְהַלְּכִ֖ים <S%H1980><s%> along בְּרַגְלֵ֥י <S%H7272><s%> be able to endure אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> my lord

וַיָּ֤קָם <S%H6965><s%> is risen אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> Yet a man לִרְדָפְךָ֔ <S%H7291><s%> to pursue וּלְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> thee and to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H5315><s%> thy soul וְֽהָיְתָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> then נֶ֨פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> but the soul אֲדֹנִ֜י <S%H113><s%> of my lord צְרוּרָ֣ה ׀ <S%H6887><s%> shall be bound בִּצְר֣וֹר <S%H6872><s%> in the bundle הַחַיִּ֗ים <S%H2416><s%> of life אֵ֚ת <S%H854><s%> with יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> with the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> נֶ֤פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and the souls אֹיְבֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H341><s%> of thine enemies יְקַלְּעֶ֔נָּה <S%H7049><s%> them shall he sling out בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> hope כַּ֥ף <S%H3709><s%> the hollow הַקָּֽלַע׃ <S%H7050><s%> of a sling

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> And David לַאֲבִיגַ֑ל <S%H26><s%> to Abigail בָּר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who שְׁלָחֵ֛ךְ <S%H7971><s%> which sent הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this לִקְרָאתִֽי׃ <S%H7122><s%> to meet

וּבָר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> And blessed טַעְמֵ֖ךְ <S%H2940><s%> [be] thy advice וּבְרוּכָ֣ה <S%H1288><s%> and blessed אָ֑תְּ <S%H859><s%> be you אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who כְּלִתִ֜נִי <S%H3607><s%> [be] thou which hast kept הַיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> me this day הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this מִבּ֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> from coming בְדָמִ֔ים <S%H1818><s%> to [shed] blood וְהֹשֵׁ֥עַ <S%H3467><s%> and from avenging יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> myself with mine own hand לִֽי׃

וְאוּלָ֗ם <S%H199><s%> For in very deed חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [as] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who מְנָעַ֔נִי <S%H4513><s%> which hath kept me back מֵהָרַ֖ע <S%H7489><s%> from hurting אֹתָ֑ךְ <S%H853><s%> כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> thee לוּלֵ֣י <S%H3884><s%> thee except מִהַ֗רְתְּ <S%H4116><s%> thou hadst hasted [וַתָּבֹאתִי כ] (וַתָּבֹאת֙ <S%H935><s%> abide ק) לִקְרָאתִ֔י <S%H7122><s%> to meet כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> not נוֹתַ֧ר <S%H3498><s%> me surely there had not been left לְנָבָ֛ל <S%H5037><s%> unto Nabal עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until א֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> light הַבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> by the morning מַשְׁתִּ֥ין <S%H8366><s%> any that pisseth בְּקִֽיר׃ <S%H7023><s%> against the wall

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> received דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> So David מִיָּדָ֔הּ <S%H3027><s%> of her hand אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what הֵבִ֖יאָה <S%H935><s%> [that] which she had brought ל֑וֹ וְלָ֣הּ אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> him and said עֲלִ֤י <S%H5927><s%> unto her Go up לְשָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H7965><s%> in peace לְבֵיתֵ֔ךְ <S%H1004><s%> to thine house רְאִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> see שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> I have hearkened בְקוֹלֵ֔ךְ <S%H6963><s%> to thy voice וָאֶשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> and have accepted פָּנָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H6440><s%> thy person

וַתָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> came אֲבִיגַ֣יִל ׀ <S%H26><s%> And Abigail אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָבָ֡ל <S%H5037><s%> to Nabal וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold לוֹ֩ מִשְׁתֶּ֨ה <S%H4960><s%> and behold he held a feast בְּבֵית֜וֹ <S%H1004><s%> in his house כְּמִשְׁתֵּ֣ה <S%H4960><s%> like the feast הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of a king וְלֵ֤ב <S%H3820><s%> heart נָבָל֙ <S%H5037><s%> and Nabal's ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [was] merry עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> within וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he שִׁכֹּ֖ר <S%H7910><s%> drunken עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> within him for he [was] very וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הִגִּ֣ידָה <S%H5046><s%> wherefore she told לּ֗וֹ דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> him nothing קָטֹ֛ן <S%H6996><s%> less וְגָד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> or more עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until א֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> light הַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> until the morning

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> became בַבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> But it came to pass in the morning בְּצֵ֤את <S%H3318><s%> was gone out הַיַּ֙יִן֙ <S%H3196><s%> when the wine מִנָּבָ֔ל <S%H5037><s%> of Nabal וַתַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> had told ל֣וֹ אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> and his wife אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> him these things הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַיָּ֤מָת <S%H4191><s%> died לִבּוֹ֙ <S%H3820><s%> that his heart בְּקִרְבּ֔וֹ <S%H7130><s%> within וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> became לְאָֽבֶן׃ <S%H68><s%> him and he became [as] a stone

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become כַּעֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> And it came to pass about ten הַיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days וַיִּגֹּ֧ף <S%H5062><s%> smote יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> [after] that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָבָ֖ל <S%H5037><s%> Nabal וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> that he died

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard דָּוִד֮ <S%H1732><s%> And when David כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> was dead נָבָל֒ <S%H5037><s%> that Nabal וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> he said בָּר֣וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who רָב֩ <S%H7378><s%> that hath pleaded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רִ֨יב <S%H7379><s%> the cause חֶרְפָּתִ֜י <S%H2781><s%> of my reproach מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> from the hand נָבָ֗ל <S%H5037><s%> of Nabal וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדּוֹ֙ <S%H5650><s%> his servant חָשַׂ֣ךְ <S%H2820><s%> and hath kept מֵֽרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> from evil וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> רָעַ֣ת <S%H7451><s%> the wickedness נָבָ֔ל <S%H5037><s%> of Nabal הֵשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> hath returned יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD בְּרֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> upon his own head וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> and communed בַּאֲבִיגַ֔יִל <S%H26><s%> with Abigail לְקַחְתָּ֥הּ <S%H3947><s%> to take ל֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> her to him to wife

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> were come עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> And when the servants דָוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲבִיגַ֖יִל <S%H26><s%> to Abigail הַכַּרְמֶ֑לָה <S%H3760><s%> to Carmel וַיְדַבְּר֤וּ <S%H1696><s%> they spake אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H413><s%> to her לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto her saying דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David שְׁלָחָ֣נוּ <S%H7971><s%> sent אֵלַ֔יִךְ <S%H413><s%> to you לְקַחְתֵּ֥ךְ <S%H3947><s%> us unto thee to take ל֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> thee to him to wife

וַתָּ֕קָם <S%H6965><s%> And she arose וַתִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed אַפַּ֖יִם <S%H639><s%> herself on [her] face אָ֑רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the earth וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲמָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H519><s%> Behold [let] thine handmaid לְשִׁפְחָ֔ה <S%H8198><s%> [be] a servant לִרְחֹ֕ץ <S%H7364><s%> to wash רַגְלֵ֖י <S%H7272><s%> the feet עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> of the servants אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> of my lord

וַתְּמַהֵ֞ר <S%H4116><s%> hasted וַתָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> and arose אֲבִיגַ֗יִל <S%H26><s%> And Abigail וַתִּרְכַּב֙ <S%H7392><s%> and rode עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַחֲמ֔וֹר <S%H2543><s%> upon an ass וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <S%H2568><s%> with five נַעֲרֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H5291><s%> damsels הַהֹלְכ֖וֹת <S%H1980><s%> of hers that went לְרַגְלָ֑הּ <S%H7272><s%> after וַתֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> along אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <S%H4397><s%> the messengers דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> and became ל֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> and became his wife

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִינֹ֛עַם <S%H293><s%> Ahinoam לָקַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> also took דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David מִֽיִּזְרְעֶ֑אל <S%H3157><s%> of Jezreel וַתִּהְיֶ֛יןָ <S%H1961><s%> became גַּֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> were also שְׁתֵּיהֶ֥ן <S%H8147><s%> and they were also both ל֖וֹ לְנָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H802><s%> of them his wives ס

וְשָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> But Saul נָתַ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> had given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִיכַ֥ל <S%H4324><s%> Michal בִּתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David's לְפַלְטִ֥י <S%H6406><s%> to Phalti בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son לַ֖יִשׁ <S%H3919><s%> of Laish אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who מִגַּלִּֽים׃ <S%H1554><s%> which [was] of Gallim
